languages.text: "Рекомендую: жареный алцедонт, чьи рога еще вчера трепали моих ловчих. Пятихвостый кревециус в соусе из томленого черноглаза. Этих малышей нужно есть быстро, пока не удрали с тарелки! А в качестве закуски особенно хороши хрустящие панцири блаберидов, приправленные синим жором. Эта специя обжигает язык, зато после... амасек покажется вам живой водой!"

traits.locale_text: "Рекомендую: жареный алцедонт, чьи рога еще вчера трепали моих ловчих. Пятихвостый кревециус в соусе из томленого черноглаза. Этих малышей нужно есть быстро, пока не удрали с тарелки! А в качестве закуски особенно хороши хрустящие панцири блаберидов, приправленные синим жором. Эта специя обжигает язык, зато после... амасек покажется вам живой водой!"
traits.speaker: FW_FakeGovernor

languages.text: "I recommend you try the fried alcedont, whose horns were still goring my hunters just the other day. And here, we have some five-tailed shrimperiuses in stewed black-eye sauce. These fellows need to be eaten quickly, before they scurry off the plate! As for the side dishes, you simply must have a taste of these crispy blaberid shells seasoned with blue glut. This spice scorches your tongue, but follow it with some amasec, and it will feel like the waters of life itself!"
languages.original_text: "Рекомендую: жареный алцедонт, чьи рога еще вчера трепали моих ловчих. Пятихвостый кревециус в соусе из томленого черноглаза. Этих малышей нужно есть быстро, пока не удрали с тарелки! А в качестве закуски особенно хороши хрустящие панцири блаберидов, приправленные синим жором. Эта специя обжигает язык, зато после... амасек покажется вам живой водой!"

traits.locale_text: "I recommend you taste the fried alcedont, whose horns were goring my dogs just the other day. And here we have five-tailed shrimperiuses in stewed black-eye sauce. These fellows need to be eaten quickly before they scurry off the plate! As for the side dish, you simply must try these crispy blaberid shells flavoured with blue glut gravy. This spice scorches your tongue, but amasec then feels like waters of life itself!"

languages.text: “我建议您尝尝炸角兽肉，前几天我的猎人刚刚尝过它们的角。还有，我们准备了黑眼酱炖五尾虾，这道菜可得快点吃，否则五尾虾就要从盘子上跑下去了！至于配菜，您一定得尝尝这些濂贝，是用蓝素调好味的。这种香料会把你的舌头烧得热辣辣的，但只要再喝上两口艾玛赛克酒，您就会觉得这酒像生命之水一样甘甜！”
languages.original_text: "I recommend you try the fried alcedont, whose horns were still goring my hunters just the other day. And here, we have some five-tailed shrimperiuses in stewed black-eye sauce. These fellows need to be eaten quickly, before they scurry off the plate! As for the side dishes, you simply must have a taste of these crispy blaberid shells seasoned with blue glut. This spice scorches your tongue, but follow it with some amasec, and it will feel like the waters of life itself!"

traits.locale_text: “我建议您尝尝炸角兽肉，前几天我的猎人刚刚尝过它们的角。还有，我们准备了黑眼酱炖五尾虾，这道菜可得快点吃，否则五尾虾就要从盘子上跑下去了！至于配菜，您一定得尝尝这些濂贝，是用蓝素调好味的。这种香料会把你的舌头烧得热辣辣的，但只要再喝上两口艾玛赛克酒，您就会觉得这酒像生命之水一样甘甜！”

languages.text: «Le recomiendo que pruebe el alcedonte asado; hace apenas unos días aún estaba corneando a mis cazadores. Y aquí tenemos unos gamboides pentacolados en salsa de ojinegro. ¡Cómaselos rápido o se le escaparán del plato! En cuanto a las guarniciones, tiene usted que probar estas estupendas almejas blabéridas aderezadas con gluto azul. Esta especia le quemará la lengua, ¡pero si la enjuaga con un poco de amasec, sentirá como si hubiese bebido las mismísimas aguas de la vida!».
languages.original_text: "I recommend you try the fried alcedont, whose horns were still goring my hunters just the other day. And here, we have some five-tailed shrimperiuses in stewed black-eye sauce. These fellows need to be eaten quickly, before they scurry off the plate! As for the side dishes, you simply must have a taste of these crispy blaberid shells seasoned with blue glut. This spice scorches your tongue, but follow it with some amasec, and it will feel like the waters of life itself!"

En cuanto a las guarniciones, tiene usted que probar estas estupendas almejas blabéridas aderezadas con gluto azul. Esta especia le quemará la lengua, ¡pero si la enjuaga con un poco de amasec, sentirá como si hubiese bebido las mismísimas aguas de la vida!».

languages.text: "Daha dün avcılarımı boynuzlayan kızarmış alsedontu denemenizi tavsiye ederim. Bu da haşlanmış siyah göz soslu, beş kuyruklu imparides. Bu yaramazları tabaktan sıvışmalarına fırsat vermeden çabucak yemek lazım! Garnitürlere gelince mavi balçıkla terbiyelenmiş çıtır böcek kabuklarının tadına mutlaka bakmalısınız. Bu baharat, dilinizi biraz yakacaktır ama ardından biraz amasek yudumlarsanız abıhayattan bir kadeh içiyormuşsunuz gibi hissedersiniz!"
languages.original_text: "I recommend you try the fried alcedont, whose horns were still goring my hunters just the other day. And here, we have some five-tailed shrimperiuses in stewed black-eye sauce. These fellows need to be eaten quickly, before they scurry off the plate! As for the side dishes, you simply must have a taste of these crispy blaberid shells seasoned with blue glut. This spice scorches your tongue, but follow it with some amasec, and it will feel like the waters of life itself!"

traits.locale_text: "Daha dün avcılarımı boynuzlayan kızarmış alsedontu denemenizi tavsiye ederim. Bu da haşlanmış siyah göz soslu, beş kuyruklu imparides. Bu yaramazları tabaktan sıvışmalarına fırsat vermeden çabucak yemek lazım! Garnitürlere gelince mavi balçıkla terbiyelenmiş çıtır böcek kabuklarının tadına mutlaka bakmalısınız. Bu baharat, dilinizi biraz yakacaktır ama ardından biraz amasek yudumlarsanız abıhayattan bir kadeh içiyormuşsunuz gibi hissedersiniz!"

languages.text: 「私はフライド・アルセドントをおすすめします。つい先日、その角がまだ狩人たちを突き刺していましたから。そして、こちらは5つの尻尾を持つシュリンペリウスの黒目ソース煮があります。これらは、プレートから逃げる前にすぐに食べなくてはなりません。サイドディッシュには、青いグラットで味付けしたカリカリのブラベリドの殻があります。このスパイスは舌の上で焼けるようですが、アマセックで流し込めば、まるで命の水のように感じるでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "I recommend you try the fried alcedont, whose horns were still goring my hunters just the other day. And here, we have some five-tailed shrimperiuses in stewed black-eye sauce. These fellows need to be eaten quickly, before they scurry off the plate! As for the side dishes, you simply must have a taste of these crispy blaberid shells seasoned with blue glut. This spice scorches your tongue, but follow it with some amasec, and it will feel like the waters of life itself!"

traits.locale_text: 「私はフライド・アルセドントをおすすめします。つい先日、その角がまだ犬を突き刺していましたから。そして、こちらは5つの尻尾を持つシュリンペリウスの黒目ソース煮があります。これらは、プレートから逃げる前にすぐに食べなくてはなりません。サイドディッシュには、青いグラットで味付けしたカリカリのブラベリドの殻があります。このスパイスは舌の上で焼けるようですが、アマセックで流し込めば、まるで命の水のように感じるでしょう！」

languages.text: « Je vous recommande d'essayer l'alcedont frit. Cette créature a embroché mes chasseurs de ses cornes il y a à peine quelques jours. Et là, nous avons des crevimperius à cinq queues, accompagnées d'une sauce à l'œil au beurre noir. Ne tardez pas à les manger si vous ne voulez pas qu'elles s'échappent de votre assiette ! Pour ce qui est des accompagnements, si vous cherchez de la croustillance, vous devez absolument goûter à ces palourdes bavardeuses au glut bleu. Ces épices vous arrachent la langue, mais après une bonne lampée d'amasec, vous aurez l'impression de naviguer dans les eaux mêmes de la vie ! »
languages.original_text: "I recommend you try the fried alcedont, whose horns were still goring my hunters just the other day. And here, we have some five-tailed shrimperiuses in stewed black-eye sauce. These fellows need to be eaten quickly, before they scurry off the plate! As for the side dishes, you simply must have a taste of these crispy blaberid shells seasoned with blue glut. This spice scorches your tongue, but follow it with some amasec, and it will feel like the waters of life itself!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous recommande d'essayer l'alcedont frit. Cette créature a embroché mes chasseurs de ses cornes il y a à peine quelques jours. Et là, nous avons des crevimperius à cinq queues, accompagnées d'une sauce à l'œil au beurre noir. Ne tardez pas à les manger si vous ne voulez pas qu'elles s'échappent de votre assiette ! Pour ce qui est des accompagnements, si vous cherchez de la croustillance, vous devez absolument goûter à ces palourdes bavardeuses au glut bleu. Ces épices vous arrachent la langue, mais après une bonne lampée d'amasec, vous aurez l'impression de naviguer dans les eaux mêmes de la vie ! »

languages.text: "Ihr müsst den gebratenen Alcedont probieren. Seine Hörner haben noch vor wenigen Tagen meine Jäger aufgespießt. Und hier haben wir fünfschwänzige Shrimperiusse in Schwarzaugensauce. Diese Biester muss man schnell essen, ehe sie vom Teller huschen! Was die Beilagen angeht, müsst Ihr unbedingt diese knusprigen Schabenpanzer kosten, mit Blauschlemm gewürzt. Das Gewürz verbrennt Euch die Zunge, aber wenn Ihr danach einen Schluck Amasec trinkt, fühlt es sich wie das Wasser des Lebens an!"
languages.original_text: "I recommend you try the fried alcedont, whose horns were still goring my hunters just the other day. This spice scorches your tongue, but follow it with some amasec, and it will feel like the waters of life itself!"
